name: Tomorrow For Mar (itch)
description:
Pass your final, graduate University and... finally confess?! Tomorrow for Mar is a 2.5D VN about crushes, tricky finals and starting a new chapter of your life. Cast spells on a large cast of quirky NPCs in Tomorrow for Mar, a 2.5D VN about the trials and tribulations of university, university tests and those pesky uni crushes. Mar needs to collect three potion ingredients in order to pass their final, but they get paired up with their longtime crush to do so! Cast spells, collect ingredients and confess!

This game features:

  1. A 2.5D environment you can walk around and explore
  2. A non-binary protagonist
  3. Magical spells you can cast on a large cast of quirky NPCs, each with unique reactions
  4. A cute little love story between two shy nerds
  5. Drink??? Snot-flavored coffee?? (Ew).

Tomorrow For Mar was originally created for the tiny games bundle. Go check it out!!!

By purchasing this bundle you are directly supporting independent game developers and allowing us to continue our passion of makin' gaems. I loved working on this title and was honored to be able to participate in this bundle and would love to keep making them!
